articles.title: DPRK Architects Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Architects Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Architects Union of Korea headed by Chairman Sim Yong Hak returned home on Sunday after visiting Mongolia.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The participants in the national meeting of workers active in planning visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Delegations of different countries and regions to take part in the 12th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Songun Provides for Independence, Peace and Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Provides for Independence, Peace and Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says Songun provides for independence, peace and reunification.
					 The article notes:
					
					 Songun of the DPRK generates tremendous power to defend the world justice and the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 The rapidly changing appearance of the DPRK such as the eye-opening achievements and miracles in bolstering nuclear deterrence and building a socialist power under the banner of Songun and on the self-development first principle are slapping hard the faces of the enemies dreaming of its "collapse".
					
					 Songun brings peace to the Korean nation which has been exposed to the constant danger of war.
					
					 Songun, indeed, serves as a powerful treasured sword which shatters the moves of the aggressors for igniting a war and guarantees lasting peace.
					
					 It deals deadly blows at the moves of the separatist forces and creates a favorable environment for national reunification, while proactively promoting national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 Thanks to the might of Songun and the driving force for national reunification which has grown strong, guided by it, the future of a prosperous and reunified country is drawing nearer day by day despite the vicious obstructions of the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 Songun serves as an immovable mainstay for the life of the Koreans and provides the Paektusan nation with inexhaustible strength which makes the enemies cry in despair.
					
					 Songun is a science and truth.

articles.title: Papers Accuse Park Geun Hye of Pulling up DPRK over Its Self-Defensive Measures
articles.content:
Papers Accuse Park Geun Hye of Pulling up DPRK over Its Self-Defensive Measures
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Papers here Sunday in their commentaries accuse traitor Park Geun Hye of escalating confrontation with the DPRK to an extreme pitch while pulling up it over its test-fire of SLBM.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Park, keeping mum about the U.S. saber-rattling threatening the destiny of the nation and her puppet forces' moves for invading the north, is reeling off such invectives against it as "provocation" and the like. This is nothing but a cynical ploy to justify her criminal policy of confrontation and, at the same time, evade the blame for pushing south Korea to total collapse by pursuing unpopular rule and throwing the people's livelihood into destitution.
					
					 Calling for "improvement of human rights in the north", she spewed up a flurry of malignant invectives about "urge" and "call for garnering sympathy". This is no more than a revelation of the inveterate hostility toward the DPRK and ambition to achieve unification of social systems and, at the same time, a poor sleight of hand to divert elsewhere the attention of the enraged people and get rid of the abyss of ruin.
					
					 The Korean nation can never live in peace and there can be no peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world as long as the Park Geun Hye group of traitors is allowed to stay in power.
					
					 As the ignorant and stupid Park group keep to the road of confrontation and war to the last, they are only fated to meet miserable ruin and death.
					
					 Minju Joson urges Park to be careful about her tongue lashing, bearing in mind there is no way out for the confrontation maniac.

articles.title: Dismantlement of U.S. Forces Bases in S. Korea Demanded by S. Korean Bodies
articles.content:
Papers Accuse Park Geun Hye of Pulling up DPRK over Its Self-Defensive Measures

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Accused of Trying to Reenact Foolish Farce for Recovering Their Defeat
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Accused of Trying to Reenact Foolish Farce for Recovering Their Defeat
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers are mulling reenacting the Inchon landing operation during the June 25 war from September 9 to 11 centering around Wolmi Island, according to KBS and News 1 of south Korea on September 1.
					 High-ranking officials of the puppet military, the mayor of Inchon City and others are planning to hold any "event marking victory in battle" and the puppet army is mulling reenacting the Inchon landing operation together with the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					
					 They are also planning a "street march", "opening to public of warships" and "operating of security exhibition".
					
					 Irony is that they are planning to reenact the Inchon landing operation well known as a disgraceful setback of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces. And more ridiculous is their charade to paint the operation as "victory in battle."
					
					 This fully reveals the real intention of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors to cover up the disgraceful defeat and incite confrontation with compatriots in a bid to realize their ambition for invading the north. 
					
					 No matter how frequently the Park group stages such farces, the history of shameful defeat suffered by the U.S. and its puppet forces can never be written off.

articles.title: Speech Made by Kim Jong Un at 9th Congress of Youth League Introduced by DR Congolese Body
articles.content:
Speech Made by Kim Jong Un at 9th Congress of Youth League Introduced by DR Congolese Body
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The full text of "Let Us Usher in a Golden Age of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth Movement", the speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, was posted by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on its website on August 30.
					 The website carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea was held in New Delhi on August 29 on the 68th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the seminar were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were publications introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were figures of political and social circles of India, chiefs of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea and the director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Speakers including the director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il said that Kim Il Sung was the great leader who founded the immortal Juche idea and provided the world with the guiding idea of the cause of independence, adding that the Juche idea was founded to open up the era of independence, a new era of history in which the popular masses are hewing out the path of the times and revolution independently and creatively as masters of the world and their own destinies.
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Il successfully led the Korean revolution by pursuing Songun politics, saying that the Songun idea is the most just revolutionary idea. 
					
					 They said the cause of the Songun revolution of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un is adding luster to the dignity of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, holding high the banner of Songun, they said.
					
					 They pointed out that thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un the DPRK ranked itself among advanced nuclear weapons states and accomplished remarkable successes in building a socialist economic giant and highly civilized nation, adding this encouraged the world revolutionary peoples aspiring after socialism.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people wisely led by Kim Jong Un, they said.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Czech Body Condemns Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Czech Body Condemns Ulji Freedom Guardian
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association in a statement on August 31 strongly denounced the aggressive Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercise that was kicked off by the U.S. and south Korea with huge war hardware involved.
					 The saber-rattling is a grave military provocation aimed to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and a blatant challenge to peace and security in the region, the statement charged.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to withdraw its forces from the Korean peninsula once and for good, not inflicting a nuclear war on the Korean people.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. stop at once the joint military exercise which aggravates the situation on the Korean peninsula, brings a nuclear war and obstructs Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Ulji Freedom Guardian Denounced by Organization of New Zealand
articles.content:
Ulji Freedom Guardian Denounced by Organization of New Zealand
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The New ZealandÔºçDPRK Society released a statement on August 25 in denunciation of the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill being conducted by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. claims the joint military drill is the one to "protect" south Korea from the DPRK's "threat", but it is nothing but a deception.
					
					 The U.S. assertion is logically reversed one.
					
					 The U.S.-led military drill in south Korea is a war drill for invading the DPRK.
					
					 Especially, as the U.S. and the south Korean authorities decided to deploy THAAD in south Korea, the tension on the Korean peninsula has further escalated.
					
					 China and Russia respond sharply to the U.S. decision on THAAD deployment.
					
					 The tension on the Korean peninsula should not be worsened.

articles.title: British Body Lambastes Traitor Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
British Body Lambastes Traitor Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article accusing traitor Park Geun Hye of resorting to sycophancy toward the U.S., confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north and unpopular rule on its website on August 17.
					 In an article titled "Dog 'president'" the website said articles satirizing Park Geun Hye were posted on websites of south Korea, drawing public attention.
					
					 When two pet dogs raised by Park at Chongwadae littered five puppies, she announced she would collect dog names through website, the article noted.
					
					 Recalling names suggested by netizens were all ridiculing and mocking Park's incompetence and unpopular rule, it said it is quite natural to term south Korea a world of dogs as it has dogs such as Park.
